title: Service Application Development Instruction Letter (IIT-S120-01) | Yönerge
text: Instruction No (IIT-S120-01) Effective Date 26-04-2011 Update Date 12-06-2024 Related Unit / Owner IT / Bilgi Teknolojileri Direktörlüğü Approved by BT / Board of Trustees Aim To describe the principles, methods, activities, and process steps for the development of service applications needed at Sabancı University. Scope Covers all service applications and application development activities provided by the Information Technologies Unit.. Principle Applications are put into service to support the university's academic and administrative processes. - Application projects are prioritized in line with the university's strategies. - The existing application portfolio is first scanned for needs. Needs that cannot be met from the existing portfolio are addressed in line with annual budget plans. - Outsourcing is used whenever possible and advantageous. Statutory Basis Definitions / Abbreviations SU: Sabancı University IT: Information Technologies Regulations 1. Developing Service Applications Service applications used to carry out university business processes electronically are discussed within the lifecycle framework described below. • Application Request Acceptance and Scoping • Planning • Analysis, Design, Development, Control • Commissioning The development of service applications is carried out in line with the lifecycle described above and within the scope of the Service Application Development (PIT S120-0101) procedure.
